item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @tha_nickscape_guy tha nickscape guy
item.description:
@tha_nickscape_guy wrote:

Hey. First: w00t first reply ok i think this is like this so if it wasn’t not my fault sorry ok first go check in your source and then your character files and open a random character. Then if you scroll a bit down you SHOULD hopefully see something like this:

character-pcpoints = 9999 character-assault = 1 character-donator = 1 character-bow = 100 character-donorPoints = 9999
If you have the…

character-donater

…thing we can continue else you have to see a guide somewhere else sorry. Ok i think you code should look like this. If i’m wrong. Sorry.

if (command.startsWith("donator") && donater >= 1) { toX = 2525; toY = 4776; sM("Thank you for Donating!"); }
That means when you set your donater on 1 you can teleport to there, but I have never tried such a command so if it’s wrong ask someone else Hope i helped!

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @EMINEM_BEAST EMINEM BEAST™
item.description:
@EMINEM_BEAST wrote:

Hi, i want to make a command that teleports a donator to a donator area,i have the coords, but im now quite sure how to put it down, atm i have it like this if (command.startsWith("donator") && playerRights >= 3) { toX = 2525; toY = 4776; sM("Thank you for Donating!"); }
how can i make it that owners and donators can use this command?
_
Edit: nvm, I’m just going to make a donator portal.

Read full topic
